title: Ralphy Integration
description: Integration of Ralphy agent into the environment.

title: Replace Default Web Tools with Firecrawl
description: Ensure OpenCode uses Firecrawl for web fetching and searching instead of default Exa/WebFetch tools.

title: Ralphy Integration: Wrapper Script
description: Create a 'ralphy' wrapper script in the environment that orchestrates OpenCode using the 'opencode --approval-mode full-auto' command pattern found in ralphy.sh.

title: Ralphy Integration: PRD Standard
description: Establish PRD.md (Markdown task list) as the standard input format for the agent loop, supporting the [ ] checklist syntax.

title: Ralphy as a Meta-Skill
description: Implement a custom OpenCode Skill ('ralphy_skill') that allows the agent to spawn recursive sub-agents via the Ralphy wrapper. This enables the 'Manager Agent' to delegate sub-tasks (e.g., 'ralphy-wrapper.sh subtask-prd.md') to isolated worker instances, leveraging the parallel worktree architecture from the original Ralphy submodule.

title: Firecrawl Advanced Configuration
description: Optimize the Firecrawl Docker setup for production-grade scraping. Current setup is basic. Future work should investigate passing advanced flags (page options, wait_for) via the MCP tool arguments in 'opencode.json' or ensuring the Docker container has persistent caching enabled for efficiency.
